document.title: Hot Topic: The 1997/98 MTAS Salary and Fringe Benefit Survey
document.abstract: The MTAS annual salary and fringe benefit survey for 1997/98 is complete and shows salary increases for city employees rose at a rate faster than 1996/97. This report contains a summary of the findings as well as a means to request specific information.
